name: Mercedes-Benz A-Class Limousine
description: The price of Mercedes-Benz A-Class Limousine, a 5 seater Sedan, ranges from Rs. 46.05  - 48.55 Lakh. It is available in 2 variants, with engine options ranging from 1332 to 1950 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. A-Class Limousine has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 7 airbags. Mercedes-Benz A-Class Limousine is available in 4 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 17.5 kmpl for A-Class Limousine.

variants.variant_name: A-Class Limousine 200 1332 cc, Petrol, Automatic (DCT), 17.5 kmpl, 161 bhp
A-Class Limousine 200d 1950 cc, Diesel, Automatic (DCT), 147 bhp
